desc.en: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.jp: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.thai: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.ko: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.zh_tw: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的對策委員會学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的对策委员会学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的对策委员会学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.ko: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.ko: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force struggles to come up with ideas on how to pay off the school's debt. Sensei and the students run into the impoverished employees of Problem Solver 68 while grabbing some ramen after the meeting.

desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會的定期会议日。学生们左思右想偿还9亿日圆的方法，但却想不到好办法。老师和学生们结束会议后去吃拉面，结果却遇到穷困潦倒的便利屋职员。

desc.en: Everyone decides to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it's there that they meets the Problem Solver 68. Having spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they can only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner takes pity on them and gives them extra ramen. Aru talks with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identities.
desc.jp: Everyone decides to take Ayane to that ramen store to have a meal, and it's there that they meets the Problem Solver 68. Having spent all the money hiring the mercenaries, they can only afford the cheapest ramen; the owner takes pity on them and gives them extra ramen. Aru talks with the Foreclosure Task Force, completely unaware of their identities.

desc.zh_tw: 众人决定带綾音去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了便利屋68全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，便利屋68只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。亞瑠跟對策委員會交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是阿拜多斯的人。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人决定带绫音去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了便利屋68全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，便利屋68只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。阿露跟对策委员会交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是阿拜多斯的人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人决定带绫音去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了便利屋68全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，便利屋68只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。亚瑠跟对策委员会交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是阿拜多斯的人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人决定带绫音去拉面店吃饭，在那他们遇到了便利屋68全员。因为钱都花在了雇佣兵上，便利屋68只能付得起最便宜的拉面；老板可怜他们，于是给了他们加量的面。爱露跟对策委员会交谈起来，丝毫没意识到是阿拜多斯的人。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.zh_tw: 抵达黑市的對策委員會一行人遇上三一综合学园的学生，日步美。日步美是为了购买佩洛洛限定玩偶才来到黑市，但却被小流氓找碴，正在逃跑当中。對策委員會一行人为了阻止那群小流氓，于是便与他们打了起来。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 抵达黑市的对策委员会一行人遇上三一综合学园的学生，日富美。日富美是为了购买佩洛洛限定玩偶才来到黑市，但却被小流氓找碴，正在逃跑当中。对策委员会一行人为了阻止那群小流氓，于是便与他们打了起来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 抵达黑市的对策委员会一行人遇上三一综合学园的学生，日步美。日步美是为了购买佩洛洛限定玩偶才来到黑市，但却被小流氓找碴，正在逃跑当中。对策委员会一行人为了阻止那群小流氓，于是便与他们打了起来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 抵达黑市的对策委员会一行人遇上三一综合学园的学生，日富美。日富美是为了购买佩洛洛限定玩偶才来到黑市，但却被小流氓找碴，正在逃跑当中。对策委员会一行人为了阻止那群小流氓，于是便与他们打了起来。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.
desc.jp: Upon entering Shiba Seki, Master Shiba's warm welcome sends Aru into a screaming fit, unable to bear her guilty conscience any longer. Before anyone can stop her, Haruka plants a bomb and blows the shop to smithereens.

desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而遙香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而遥香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱露在柴关拉面店吃拉面时，听了老板的窝心鼓励，终于承受不住良心的谴责而放声喊叫。然而春香却误解亚的喊叫，反而把炸弹装在店里，把柴关拉面店炸得不留痕迹。

desc.en: The ramen restaurant owner mistakes the Problem Solver 68 for Abydos' friends. Aru suddenly realizes that it was the restaurant that prevents her being a real villain. Haruka, who is unsure of Aru's intention, still blows up the restaurant without a second thought.

desc.en: Seminar's treasurer, Yuuka, intends to shut down the Game Development Department due to its lackluster performance. And so, Midori and Momoi head to the ruins in search of a secret weapon to prevent their club's closure.

desc.zh_tw: 研討會的会计優香，打算以遊戲開發部实绩不佳为由关闭社团。綠和桃井为了反抗優香，便前往<废墟>寻找秘密武器。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 研讨会的会计优香，打算以游戏开发部实绩不佳为由关闭社团。绿和桃井为了反抗优香，便前往<废墟>寻找秘密武器。

desc.en: Yuuka came to explain the situation, stating that the closure was inevitable. Momoi and Midori argued righteously, but was greeted with the mock of their only product - TSC, the very game that won the first place of The Worst Game of The Year.

desc.en: The Game Development Department heads to the Engineering Department to get Aris a firearm. Aris ends up picking a railgun meant to be attached to an intergalactic battleship. The Engineering Department challenges Aris to a fight to test her abilities.

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部学生为了取得能让愛麗絲使用的枪支,便前往 千年学园的<工程師部>。愛麗絲在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程師部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部学生为了取得能让爱丽丝使用的枪支,便前往 千禧年学园的<工程部>。爱丽丝在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部学生为了取得能让爱丽丝使用的枪支,便前往 千年学园的<工程部>。爱丽丝在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。

desc.en: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.

desc.en: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was then introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also shot a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Department, that they could take it away if they won them.
desc.jp: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was then introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also shot a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Department, that they could take it away if they won them.

desc.zh_tw: 詠葉等工程師部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。響主动提出要为愛麗絲找武器，但愛麗絲很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。亞都梨主动为愛麗絲介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程師部众人本以为愛麗絲无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程師部决定测试遊戲開發部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 歌原等工程部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。柯托莉主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 咏叶等工程师部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。亚都梨主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程师部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程师部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 歌原等工程部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。琴里主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。

desc.en: During the meeting held two hours ago, Hare mentioned that the only way to access the Contraband Room would be the lifts. Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system with EMP for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to hack in.

Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system with EMP for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to hack in.

desc.zh_tw: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，響提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时貝里塔斯即可开始骇入。
